titles.title: To designate the Hacienda Buena Vista National Historic Landmark.
To designate the Hacienda Buena Vista National Historic Landmark.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: This bill designates the Hacienda Buena Vista in Ponce, Puerto Rico, as the "Hacienda Buena Vista National Historic Landmark."
